p: Eltrombopag is a thrombopoietin receptor (also known as c-Mpl or MPL) agonist that is used for the treatment of thrombocytopenia, including hepatitis C virus-associated thrombocytopenia [ 1, 2, 3]. Its use has also been suggested for the treatment of cytopenias after hematopoietic stem cell transplantations and case reports support its safety and efficacy [ 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9].
